channel.title: cubit software on Cork OpenCoffee
channel.description: Recent content in cubit software on Cork OpenCoffee

item.title: We never got past the introductions!
item.description: This is my second time to write this post as the first one got deleted accidentally. We had a particularly good OCC meet-up last Friday in the Rubicon with four new faces. The round table introductions caused so many spin-off conversations that we ended up not doing anything else! A welcome then to: * Bob Gee of [Connect Promotions](http://www.connectpro.ie/) who seemed delighted by the response of us all to his business (promotional items or schwag as we geeks call it).
